# textureRegion

**Instance Property**

The region in the texture to update, in tiles.

## Declaration

```swift
var textureRegion: MTLRegion
```

## Discussion

When [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4UpdateSparseTextureMappingOperation/textureLevel] is equal to the texture’s [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTexture/firstMipmapInTail], set `origin.y` to `0` and `size.height` to `1`.
